inclusion.criterion: smoking and obstructive disease with FEV1/FVC < 70%

inclusion.criterion: presence of mild-to-moderate daytime hypoxemia with a daytime PaO2 in the range of 56-69 mmHg

inclusion.criterion: patients fulfilling our definition of nocturnal oxygen desaturation: >= 30% of the recording time with transcutaneous arterial oxygen saturation < 90%
inclusion.label: met
